alert.note: Alert for Bay; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 1:58PM EDT until June 09 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Bonifay to near De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bonifay, Bradford, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Bahoma and Chipley Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
